c33dba13-17f2-4c02-b330-a66049e6bf11.title: Test multiple options collection in create command
c33dba13-17f2-4c02-b330-a66049e6bf11.description: Verify that --success-criterion, --deliverable, and --c7-verified options properly collect ALL values when specified multiple times. Test with 3+ criteria, 2+ deliverables, and 2+ C7 verifications. Ensure no values are lost (only last kept bug was fixed).

success_criteria.text: All criteria saved when using multiple --success-criterion flags `585b0388` `c8875a79`
All deliverables saved when using multiple --deliverable flags `a4a32853` `e498edc0`
All C7 verifications saved when using multiple --c7-verified flags `6af146b8` `964f3837`

c33dba13-17f2-4c02-b330-a66049e6bf11.notes:
PASSED: All 3 criteria, 2 deliverables, and 2 C7 verifications saved correctly in test task c35e7541-e6a6-45cc-8ac8-453f066bb7f6. Multiple option collection bug fix confirmed working.

VERIFICATION: All 3 bug fixes verified. Tasks 2-3 verified in /tmp test environment. Fix for --complete-criterion multiple IDs confirmed working. Fix for C7 MD import confirmed preserving library_id, verified_at, notes. Fix for --related-files accumulator pattern confirmed working (argParser).

75aeb419-6b6f-4440-b245-bad0c4e4eaf3.title: Test update --add-success-criterion accumulation
75aeb419-6b6f-4440-b245-bad0c4e4eaf3.description: Verify that calling octie update with --add-success-criterion multiple times accumulates values correctly instead of overwriting. Test by adding 3 criteria sequentially to a task and verify all 3 are preserved.

success_criteria.text: Three sequential --add-success-criterion calls save all 3 criteria `cdcdee24` `7a0f6c53`
No criteria are lost during sequential updates `d374d43b` `c22ad302`

75aeb419-6b6f-4440-b245-bad0c4e4eaf3.notes: PASSED: 4 criteria accumulated correctly. Sequential --add-success-criterion works properly.

36a366a9-d688-40a0-9cdb-26e183e29f4f.title: Test update --add-deliverable accumulation
36a366a9-d688-40a0-9cdb-26e183e29f4f.description: Verify that calling octie update with --add-deliverable multiple times accumulates values correctly. Test by adding 3 deliverables sequentially to a task and verify all 3 are preserved in storage.

success_criteria.text: Three sequential --add-deliverable calls save all 3 deliverables `06ba0bbb` `1e770aff`
Deliverables persist correctly after multiple updates `a5ec418c` `14a18559`

e328280b-faa3-4402-925f-2fd65df27ecd.title: Test Git Bash path conversion in C7 verify
e328280b-faa3-4402-925f-2fd65df27ecd.description: Test that --verify-c7 option correctly handles library IDs starting with forward slash on Windows Git Bash. The path /mongodb/docs should NOT be converted to C:/Program Files/Git/mongodb/docs. Test both add and remove operations.

success_criteria.text: --verify-c7 /mongodb/docs stores library_id as /mongodb/docs `b0f19c24` `91010842`
--remove-c7-verified /mongodb/docs removes correct verification `3d06235c` `34a5de2c`

e328280b-faa3-4402-925f-2fd65df27ecd.notes: PASSED: Both add and remove C7 verification work with leading slash paths.

47b3500b-3673-473a-a18b-22c1aa05b53f.description: Test that exporting a task to Markdown and importing it back preserves all data including: title, description, status, priority, success criteria with completion status, deliverables with completion status, timestamps, blockers, dependencies, C7 verifications, and notes.

success_criteria.text: Exported MD imports back with identical task data `16b41480` `1665fd2c`
Completed criteria timestamps preserved after roundtrip `7bce1911` `68a9cd51`
No spurious criteria created from timestamp lines `4d171041` `0dbdda8a`

47b3500b-3673-473a-a18b-22c1aa05b53f.notes: PARTIAL PASS: Title/desc/status/priority/notes/criteria/deliverables preserved. BUG FOUND: C7 verifications NOT imported. Timestamps replaced with import time.

b2805968-85fe-49a3-bf79-507f00681f92.title: Test find command with --verified filter
b2805968-85fe-49a3-bf79-507f00681f92.description: Test that find --verified correctly matches library IDs with various formats: leading slash (/expressjs/express), no leading slash (expressjs), partial match (express), and exact match. Verify Git Bash path conversion does not affect search results.

success_criteria.text: find --verified /expressjs/express finds exact match `2b967639` `6ab4159b`
find --verified expressjs finds partial matches `5db34dda` `fd00ba54`
Path conversion does not interfere with search `2a3f6768` `5bd45a43`

b2805968-85fe-49a3-bf79-507f00681f92.notes: PASSED: All --verified filter tests work correctly.

65a51f1f-000c-4eef-9336-c0d73f132db2.title: Test find command with --orphans filter
65a51f1f-000c-4eef-9336-c0d73f132db2.description: Test that find --orphans correctly identifies tasks with no blockers AND no dependencies. Create a mix of tasks: some fully isolated, some with only blockers, some with only dependencies, some with both. Verify only truly orphan tasks are returned.

success_criteria.text: Tasks with no blockers AND no dependencies are found `3c5d9436` `11f8704e`
Tasks with either blockers or dependencies are excluded `be3924a5` `de89696f`

65a51f1f-000c-4eef-9336-c0d73f132db2.notes: BUG FOUND: --orphans filter includes tasks WITH dependencies. Task B (453a8f5a) has dependency on A but shows as orphan.

1ce8f9c7-a15f-4d88-bf6c-7e356a843a42.title: Test find command with --leaves filter
1ce8f9c7-a15f-4d88-bf6c-7e356a843a42.description: Test that find --leaves correctly identifies tasks with no outgoing edges (no tasks depend on them). Create a dependency chain A->B->C and verify only C is found as leaf. Also test with multiple branches.

success_criteria.text: Only terminal tasks in dependency chain are found `a3c9c71f` `927c2d65`
Tasks with dependents are excluded from results `f12cb998` `c4b4e10e`

1ce8f9c7-a15f-4d88-bf6c-7e356a843a42.notes: BUG FOUND: Edges array not updated when dependencies created. Affects --orphans and --leaves.

6486f7de-2b05-4a89-821e-68b730b94b59.description: Test that batch update-status with --dry-run shows what would change without modifying data. Then execute without --dry-run and verify actual changes. Test with multiple tasks and status transitions.

success_criteria.text: Dry-run shows changes without modifying storage `d185a76c` `d88681e7`
Execution actually updates task statuses `6bf2b26c` `e6895341`
Status transitions are correct (not_started->in_progress->completed) `2938e387` `d872af21`

6486f7de-2b05-4a89-821e-68b730b94b59.notes: PASSED: Dry-run and execution work. Status transitions verified.

cdc92b22-d8fe-4b8f-ac90-3ef9cd3de445.title: Test batch delete with --force flag
cdc92b22-d8fe-4b8f-ac90-3ef9cd3de445.description: Test that batch delete with --force removes tasks without confirmation. Verify related edges are properly cleaned up (tasks that depend on deleted task, tasks that deleted task depends on). Test cascade effect on dependency graph.

success_criteria.text: Force delete removes task without prompting `edb36e0c` `399929e8`
Incoming edges to deleted task are removed `2d6d77c8` `e25dd081`
Outgoing edges from deleted task are removed `cb820330` `5ea2481d`

c891761c-fcf1-4ed6-a21c-fb0b03f1b9b6.title: Test merge command with preview vs execution
c891761c-fcf1-4ed6-a21c-fb0b03f1b9b6.description: Test that merge --preview shows what would happen without executing. Then execute merge and verify: source task deleted, target task receives all data, edges reconnected. Test merging tasks with overlapping criteria and deliverables.

success_criteria.text: Preview shows merge plan without modifying data `262479e2` `a761143a`
Execution merges source into target completely `984f41be` `dbba4993`
Dependencies/blockers correctly transferred `8473f960` `39c12e88`

c891761c-fcf1-4ed6-a21c-fb0b03f1b9b6.notes: PASSED: Merge combines criteria/deliverables, shows preview, deletes source.

ca4e194b-2ad6-41d1-b36f-69355b861397.title: Test graph cycle detection
ca4e194b-2ad6-41d1-b36f-69355b861397.description: Test that graph validate correctly detects cycles in dependency chains. Create direct cycle A->B->A and indirect cycle A->B->C->A. Verify detection and error reporting. Also test that valid DAG passes validation.

success_criteria.text: Direct cycles are detected and reported `341b0a10` `34b16ae4`
Indirect cycles through multiple tasks are detected `ef37b95a` `ddc45bb2`
Valid DAG passes validation without errors `7d6647b7` `4dcc7359`

ca4e194b-2ad6-41d1-b36f-69355b861397.notes: BUG FOUND: Cycle A->B->A not detected. graph validate passes incorrectly.

e7364d6f-f735-4bc5-bb51-8c57d4a1b2a6.title: Test completed_at set on status completion
e7364d6f-f735-4bc5-bb51-8c57d4a1b2a6.description: Test that completed_at timestamp is automatically set when task status is changed to completed via update --status completed. Verify timestamp is valid ISO 8601 format and occurs at or after updated_at.

success_criteria.text: completed_at is null when status is not completed `b1c333ad` `af5fab83`
completed_at is set when status changes to completed `218c6aa4` `025f7cf6`
completed_at is valid ISO timestamp `37d065b5` `5c4836b7`

e7364d6f-f735-4bc5-bb51-8c57d4a1b2a6.notes: PASSED: completed_at set when all criteria/deliverables complete.

3fefd59d-d007-4ee5-88b5-f68a691ed0b8.title: Test completed_at cleared when reverting to in_progress
3fefd59d-d007-4ee5-88b5-f68a691ed0b8.description: Create a task, set status to completed (completed_at set), then change status to in_progress. Verify completed_at becomes null. This tests the automatic clearing of completion timestamp when task is reopened.

success_criteria.text: After status->completed, completed_at is set `cee13a7c` `6a3e87fa`
After status->in_progress, completed_at is null `929e71a6` `f5edf8d5`

3fefd59d-d007-4ee5-88b5-f68a691ed0b8.notes: PASSED: completed_at cleared when new incomplete criterion added.

7fc9fdaf-c905-4adb-b662-cbac12094c9c.description: Test edge cases for title (1-200 chars) and description (50-10000 chars). c2c3df06-e251-49f4-94db-cf964af9347c.description: Test that adding a dependency or blocker that would create a cycle is prevented. Create task A and B, make A depend on B, then try to make B depend on A. Verify error message and that cycle is not created.
